basic.name: Harden Carapace (W)
basic.description: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 340 damage over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Burrow Charge (E)
basic.description: Burrow to the target location, dealing 91 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

heroic.name: Locust Swarm (R)
heroic.description: Deal 68 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Cocoon (R)
heroic.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

trait.name: Scarab Host (T)
trait.description: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 damage.

1.name: Nerubian Armor
1.description: Increase Hardened Carapace's Spell Armor by 25.

1.name: Legion of Beetles
1.description: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Bed of Barbs
4.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Shed Exoskeleton
4.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

7.name: Subterranean Shield
7.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 400 point Shield for 5 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles gain 30% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

10.name: Locust Swarm
10.description: Deal 68 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Urticating Spines
13.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 90 damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

13.name: Burning Beetles
13.description: Deal 21 damage per second to nearby enemies. Beetles deal 6 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 80% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

16.name: Debilitation
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge or Impale have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: Passive: Beetles gain 30% increased health.Every 4th Basic Attack spawns a Beetle.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 165 damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 80 health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 6 seconds per Cocoon. Upon exiting the Cocoon, enemies take 60 damage over 4 seconds. This damage is increased by 100% for each second that they were inside.

20.name: The Traitor King
20.description: Gain 10% bonus maximum Health and 20 Spell Armor.Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
